pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
nouns which may take the genitive case particle 'no'

related.meaning: untuk unggul, untuk melampaui, untuk mengalahkan pesaing
leluhur keluarga, zaman sebelumnya, generasi sebelumnya
baru-baru ini, beberapa hari yang lalu

lessons.japanese: おまえってほんとに正しい優先順位がわかってないな。
lessons.indonesian: You really don't have the right priorities!

lessons.japanese: 君は本当に優先順位がおかしいよ。
lessons.indonesian: You really don't have the right priorities!

lessons.japanese: 貴社のご注文は最優先させております。
lessons.indonesian: We have given your order highest priority.

lessons.japanese: 何よりも義務を優先すべきだ。
lessons.indonesian: Duty should come before anything else.

lessons.japanese: 何よりも安全を優先すべきだよ。
lessons.indonesian: You should put safety before everything else.

lessons.japanese: 何よりも安全を優先しなければならない。
lessons.indonesian: We must put safety before anything else.

lessons.japanese: この任務はすべての任務に優先する。
lessons.indonesian: This duty has priority over all others.

lessons.japanese: 勿論最初の約束優先ということで謝ったわ。
lessons.indonesian: Of course I apologised, saying that the first appointment had priority.

lessons.japanese: 彼女の条件が結婚相手を選ぶ際の優先事項だ。
lessons.indonesian: Her conditions for choosing a marriage partner took priority.

lessons.japanese: 優先権をどうすべきか決定できないのが、最大の問題である。
lessons.indonesian: Not being able to decide what the priority should be is the biggest problem.

lessons.japanese: 彼は他の人より優先されるべきだ。
lessons.indonesian: He should be given preference over the others.
